      • saveLinearLayoutFields

        public static void saveLinearLayoutFields(java.util.List<java.lang.String> extraFields,
                                          int[] id_fields,
                                          android.widget.LinearLayout linFree)
        Static method used to save a set of Fields to a String array
        Parameters:
        extraFields - Array of String. If string are present they will be override, otherwise new strings will be create
        id_fields - Array of View ID, used to retrieve views
        linFree - Linear Layout containing fields

      • restoreLinearLayoutFields

        public static void restoreLinearLayoutFields(java.util.List<java.lang.String> extraFields,
                                             int[] id_fields,
                                             android.widget.LinearLayout linFree)
        Static method used to populate a set of fields with values from String array
        Parameters:
        extraFields - Array of string, values that will be displayed in views.
        id_fields - Array of View ID, used to retrieve views
        linFree - Linear Layout containing fields
